title: A blueprint for a nanoscale pump
Injectable nanocarriers for biodetoxification
title_cn: 用于生物解毒的可注射纳米载体
abstract: Hospitals routinely treat patients suffering from overdoses of drugs or other toxic chemicals as a result of illicit drug consumption, suicide attempts or accidental exposures. However, for many life-threatening situations, specific antidotes are not available and treatment is largely based on emptying the stomach, administering activated charcoal or other general measures of intoxication support. A promising strategy for managing such overdoses is to inject nanocarriers that can extract toxic agents from intoxicated tissues. To be effective, the nanocarriers must remain in the blood long enough to sequester the toxic components and/or their metabolites, and the toxin bound complex must also remain stable until it is removed from the bloodstream. Here, we discuss the principles that govern the use of injectable nanocarriers in biodetoxification and review the pharmacological performance of a number of different approaches.
abstract_cn: 医院通常会因服用非法药物，自杀未遂或意外接触而服用过量药物或其他有毒化学物质的患者。 但是，在许多威胁生命的情况下，无法使用特定的解毒剂，治疗主要基于排空胃，施用活性炭或其他一般的中毒支持措施。 处理这种过量的一种有前途的策略是注射可以从中毒组织中提取有毒物质的纳米载体。 为了有效，纳米载体必须在血液中保留足够长的时间以隔离毒性成分和/或其代谢产物，并且毒素结合的复合物也必须保持稳定，直到将其从血液中清除为止。 在这里，我们讨论了控制可注射纳米载体在生物解毒中的使用的原理，并回顾了许多不同方法的药理学性能。

title: Nano-architectures by covalent assembly of molecular building blocks
title_cn: 通过分子构件的共价组装的纳米结构
abstract: The construction of electronic devices from single molecular building blocks, which possess certain functions such as switching or rectifying and are connected by atomic-scale wires on a supporting surface, is an essential goal of molecular electronics. A key challenge is the controlled assembly of molecules into desired architectures by strong, that is, covalent, intermolecular connections, enabling efficient electron transport between the molecules and providing high stability. However, no molecular networks on surfaces ‘locked’ by covalent interactions have been reported so far. Here, we show that such covalently bound molecular nanostructures can be formed on a gold surface upon thermal activation of porphyrin building blocks and their subsequent chemical reaction at predefined connection points. We demonstrate that the topology of these nanostructures can be precisely engineered by controlling the chemical structure of the building blocks. Our results represent a versatile route for future bottom-up construction of sophisticated electronic circuits and devices, based on individual functionalized molecules.
abstract_cn: 由单个分子构件构建电子设备是分子电子学的基本目标，该分子构件具有某些功能，如开关或整流，并通过原子尺度的导线在支撑面上连接。关键的挑战是通过牢固的（即共价的）分子间连接，将分子受控地组装成所需的结构，从而实现分子之间的有效电子传输并提供高稳定性。但是，表面上没有分子网络被锁定。迄今为止，共价相互作用的报道。在这里，我们显示了在卟啉构件的热活化及其在预定的连接点进行的后续化学反应后，可以在金表面上形成此类共价键合的分子纳米结构。我们证明可以通过控制构件的化学结构来精确设计这些纳米结构的拓扑。我们的结果代表了基于单个功能化分子的未来自底向上构造复杂电子电路和设备的通用途径。

title: Single functional group interactions with individual carbon nanotubes
title_cn: 单官能团与单个碳纳米管的相互作用
abstract: Carbon nanotubes display a consummate blend of materials properties that affect applications ranging from nanoelectronic circuits and biosensors to field emitters and membranes. These applications use the non-covalent interactions between the nanotubes and chemical functionalities, often involving a few molecules at a time. Despite their wide use, we still lack a fundamental understanding and molecular-level control of these interactions. We have used chemical force microscopy to measure the strength of the interactions of single chemical functional groups with the sidewalls of vapour-grown individual single-walled carbon nanotubes. Surprisingly, the interaction strength does not follow conventional trends of increasing polarity or hydrophobicity, and instead reflects the complex electronic interactions between the nanotube and the functional group. Ab initio calculations confirm the observed trends and predict binding force distributions for a single molecular contact that match the experimental results. Our analysis also reveals the important role of molecular linkage dynamics in determining interaction strength at the single functional group level.
abstract_cn: 碳纳米管显示出完美的混合材料特性，这些特性影响着从纳米电子电路和生物传感器到场发射器和膜的各种应用。这些应用使用了纳米管和化学官能团之间的非共价相互作用，通常一次涉及几个分子。尽管它们被广泛使用，但我们仍然缺乏对这些相互作用的基本了解和分子水平的控制。我们已经使用化学力显微镜来测量单个化学官能团与蒸气生长的单个单壁碳纳米管的侧壁相互作用的强度。令人惊讶地，相互作用强度不遵循增加极性或疏水性的常规趋势，而是反映了纳米管和官能团之间的复杂电子相互作用。从头算计算可以确认观察到的趋势，并预测与实验结果匹配的单个分子接触的结合力分布。我们的分析还揭示了分子键动力学在确定单个官能团水平上的相互作用强度中的重要作用。</ p>

title: Local ionic and electron heating in single-molecule junctions
title_cn: 单分子结中的局部离子和电子加热
abstract: A basic aim in molecular electronics is to understand transport through a single molecule connected to two electrodes. Substantial progress towards this goal has been made over the past decade as a result of advances in both experimental techniques and theoretical methods. Nonetheless, a fundamental and technologically important issue, current-induced local heating of molecules, has received much less attention. Here, we report on a combined experimental and theoretical study of local heating in single molecules (6-, 8- and 10-alkanedithiol) covalently attached to two gold electrodes as a function of applied bias and molecular length. We find that the effective local temperature of the molecular junction first increases with applied bias, and then decreases after reaching a maximum. At fixed bias, the effective temperature decreases with increasing molecular length. These experimental findings are in agreement with hydrodynamic predictions, which include both electron–phonon and electron–electron interactions.
abstract_cn: 分子电子学的基本目标是了解通过连接到两个电极的单个分子的传输。在过去的十年中，由于实验技术和理论方法的进步，取得了实质性的进展。然而，一个基本的和技术上重要的问题，即电流引起的分子局部加热，受到的关注要少得多。在这里，我们报告了结合在两个金电极上的单分子（6-，8-和10-烷二硫醇）中局部加热的局部实验和理论加热的组合实验，作为施加的偏压和分子长度的函数。我们发现分子结的有效局部温度首先随着施加的偏压而升高，然后在达到最大值后降低。在固定偏压下，有效温度随着分子长度的增加而降低。这些实验结果与流体动力预测相符，其中既包括电子声子，也包括电子相互作用。

title: Spatial manipulation of nanoacoustic waves with nanoscale spot sizes
title_cn: 具有纳米级斑点尺寸的纳米声波的空间操纵
abstract: Coherent acoustic phonons are generated at terahertz frequencies when semiconductor quantum-well nanostructures are illuminated by femtosecond laser pulses. These phonons—also known as nanoacoustic waves—typically have wavelengths of tens of nanometres, which could prove useful in applications such as non-invasive ultrasonic imaging and sound amplification by the stimulated emission of radiation. However, optical diffraction effects mean that the nanoacoustic waves are produced with spot sizes on the micrometre scale. Near-field optical techniques can produce waves with smaller spot sizes, but they only work near surfaces. Here, we show that a far-field optical technique—which suffers no such restrictions—can be used to spatially manipulate the phonon generation process so that nanoacoustic waves are emitted with lateral dimensions that are much smaller than the laser wavelength. We demonstrate that nanoacoustic waves with wavelengths and spot sizes of the order of 10 nm and 100 nm, respectively, can be generated and detected.
abstract_cn: 当飞秒激光脉冲照射半导体量子阱纳米结构时，相干声子以太赫兹频率产生。这些声子通常也称为纳米声波，具有数十纳米的波长，可以证明在非侵入性超声成像和受激辐射发射声放大等应用中很有用。但是，光学衍射效应意味着产生的纳米声波具有微米级的光斑尺寸。近场光学技术可以产生具有较小光斑尺寸的波，但它们仅在表面附近工作。在这里，我们表明可以使用不受此限制的远场光学技术来空间地控制声子的产生过程，从而以横向尺寸发射远小于激光波长的纳米声波。我们证明，可以产生和检测波长和光斑大小分别为10＆＃160nm和100＆＃160nm的纳米声波。</ p>

title: A charge-driven molecular water pump
abstract: Understanding and controlling the transport of water across nanochannels is of great importance for designing novel molecular devices, machines and sensors and has wide applications, including the desalination of seawater. Nanopumps driven by electric or magnetic fields can transport ions and magnetic quanta, but water is charge-neutral and has no magnetic moment. On the basis of molecular dynamics simulations, we propose a design for a molecular water pump. The design uses a combination of charges positioned adjacent to a nanopore and is inspired by the structure of channels in the cellular membrane that conduct water in and out of the cell (aquaporins). The remarkable pumping ability is attributed to the charge dipole-induced ordering of water confined in the nanochannels, where water can be easily driven by external fields in a concerted fashion. These findings may provide possibilities for developing water transport devices that function without osmotic pressure or a hydrostatic pressure gradient.
abstract_cn: 了解和控制水在纳米通道中的传输对于设计新颖的分子装置，机器和传感器非常重要，并且具有广泛的应用，包括海水淡化。由电场或磁场驱动的纳米泵可以传输离子和磁性量子，但是水是电荷中性的，没有磁矩。在分子动力学模拟的基础上，我们提出了一种分子水泵的设计。该设计使用了位于纳米孔附近的电荷的组合，并受到细胞膜中将水导入和导出细胞（水通道蛋白）的通道结构的启发。出色的泵送能力归因于电荷偶极子引起的水在纳米通道中的有序化，其中水可以很容易地被外部电场以一致的方式驱动。这些发现可能为开发在没有渗透压或静水压力梯度的情况下运行的输水装置提供了可能性。

title: Direct imaging of single-walled carbon nanotubes in cells
title_cn: 细胞中单壁碳纳米管的直接成像
abstract: The development of single-walled carbon nanotubes for various biomedical applications is an area of great promise. However, the contradictory data on the toxic effects of single-walled carbon nanotubes highlight the need for alternative ways to study their uptake and cytotoxic effects in cells. Single-walled carbon nanotubes have been shown to be acutely toxic in a number of types of cells, but the direct observation of cellular uptake of single-walled carbon nanotubes has not been demonstrated previously due to difficulties in discriminating carbon-based nanotubes from carbon-rich cell structures. Here we use transmission electron microscopy and confocal microscopy to image the translocation of single-walled carbon nanotubes into cells in both stained and unstained human cells. The nanotubes were seen to enter the cytoplasm and localize within the cell nucleus, causing cell mortality in a dose-dependent manner.
abstract_cn: 为各种生物医学应用开发单壁碳纳米管是一个充满希望的领域。 但是，有关单壁碳纳米管毒性作用的矛盾数据强调了需要其他方法来研究其在细胞中的吸收和细胞毒性作用。 单壁碳纳米管已在多种类型的细胞中显示出剧毒，但由于难以区分碳基纳米管和碳纳米管，因此以前尚未直接观察到细胞对单壁碳纳米管吸收的直接观察结果。 丰富的细胞结构。 在这里，我们使用透射电子显微镜和共聚焦显微镜对单壁碳纳米管在染色和未染色的人类细胞中的移位进行成像。 观察到纳米管进入细胞质并定位于细胞核内，导致细胞死亡呈剂量依赖性。

title: Sequence-specific detection of individual DNA polymerase complexes in real time using a nanopore
title_cn: 使用纳米孔实时检测单个DNA聚合酶复合物的序列特异性
abstract: Nanoscale pores have potential to be used as biosensors and are an established tool for analysing the structure and composition of single DNA or RNA molecules. Recently, nanopores have been used to measure the binding of enzymes to their DNA substrates. In this technique, a polynucleotide bound to an enzyme is drawn into the nanopore by an applied voltage. The force exerted on the charged backbone of the polynucleotide by the electric field is used to examine the enzyme–polynucleotide interactions. Here we show that a nanopore sensor can accurately identify DNA templates bound in the catalytic site of individual DNA polymerase molecules. Discrimination among unbound DNA, binary DNA/polymerase complexes, and ternary DNA/polymerase/deoxynucleotide triphosphate complexes was achieved in real time using finite state machine logic. This technique is applicable to numerous enzymes that bind or modify DNA or RNA including exonucleases, kinases and other polymerases.
abstract_cn: 纳米孔具有用作生物传感器的潜力，并且是用于分析单个DNA或RNA分子的结构和组成的成熟工具。 最近，纳米孔已被用于测量酶与其DNA底物的结合。 在该技术中，通过施加电压将与酶结合的多核苷酸吸入纳米孔。 通过电场施加在多核苷酸的带电主链上的力用于检查酶与多核苷酸的相互作用。 在这里，我们显示出纳米孔传感器可以准确识别结合在单个DNA聚合酶分子催化位点中的DNA模板。 未结合的DNA，二元DNA /聚合酶复合物和三元DNA /聚合酶/脱氧核苷酸三磷酸复合物之间的区别是使用有限状态机逻辑实时实现的。 该技术适用于结合或修饰DNA或RNA的多种酶，包括外切核酸酶，激酶和其他聚合酶。</ p>

title: Doping and phonon renormalization in carbon nanotubes
title_cn: 碳纳米管中的掺杂和声子重正化
abstract: We show that the Raman frequency associated with the vibrational mode at ∼1,580 cm−1 (the G mode) in both metallic and semiconducting carbon nanotubes shifts in response to changes in the charge density induced by an external gate field. These changes in the Raman spectra provide us with a powerful tool for probing local doping in carbon nanotubes in electronic device structures, or charge carrier densities induced by environmental interactions, on a length scale determined by the light diffraction limit. The G mode shifts to higher frequency and narrows in linewidth in metallic carbon nanotubes at large fields. This behaviour is analogous to that observed recently in graphene. In semiconducting carbon nanotubes, on the other hand, induced changes in the charge density only shift the phonon frequency, but do not affect its linewidth. These spectral changes are quantitatively explained by a model that involves the renormalization of the carbon nanotube phonon energy by the electron–phonon interaction as the carrier density in the carbon nanotube is changed.
abstract_cn: 我们表明，金属和半导体碳纳米管中与振动模式相关的拉曼频率在＆＃8764; 1,580 cm ＆＃8722; 1 （G模式）下均发生响应由外部栅极场感应的电荷密度。拉曼光谱的这些变化为我们提供了一个功能强大的工具，可以在由光衍射极限确定的长度范围内探测电子器件结构中碳纳米管中的局部掺杂或由环境相互作用引起的电荷载流子密度。在大电场下，金属碳纳米管中的G模式转移到更高的频率并缩小了线宽。此行为类似于最近在石墨烯中观察到的行为。另一方面，在半导体碳纳米管中，电荷密度的感应变化只会移动声子频率，而不会影响其线宽。这些光谱变化可以通过一个模型进行定量解释，该模型涉及随着碳纳米管中载流子密度的变化，通过电子声子相互作用使碳纳米管声子能量重新归一化。
